chapters.title: Chapter 8: The Storm Gathers
chapters.info: Theodrin Dabei, p. 172 (234)—A former Accepted in Salidar, now raised to something higher than Accepted but lower than a full Aes Sedai (due to the absence of the Oath Rod). She is trying to dismantle Nynaeve's block to channeling at will. See also Charel; Marel.
